name: Tech Career Growth Navigator
description: Tech Career Growth is a community that supports software developers. They have a lot of resources but maintaining a repository of those resources has been a challenge. This project serves to help them and the people they support by building a better medium for their resources to be found. As the user interacts with the page resources matching their results are returned.

stories.name: Routes
stories.description: There are two routes, 1. Navigator (/navigator) and 2. About (/about)
requirements: Setup the site routes

stories.name: Site Header
stories.description: The site header includes the Tech Career Growth logo, the site title, and navigation
requirements: The site header appears on both pages of the site
The active link has a green background color (ex. when the user is on the About page the About navigation button has a green background)
Clicking on the site navigation buttons (Navigator and About) take the user to that page

stories.name: Navigator page
stories.description: This page features a brief description and then the inputs for the user to interact with.
requirements: Brief blurb about the Tech Career Growth Navigator
Radio inputs for each of the following: Improving my resume, Interviewing, Moving up the career ladder, Productivity, Building projects, General growth and learning

stories.name: Improving my resume
stories.description: When the user selects this input provide the resources listed in the requirements
requirements: Title: How To Write An Effective Software Engineering Resume (Medium Article), link: https://chioualexander.medium.com/how-to-write-an-effective-software-engineering-resume-e42713a7a2ca?sk=a5da48df741ae973bf1389f42d6948db
Title: How To Write A Stellar Tech Resume That Gets Your More Job Opportunities (Session Slides), link: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/15eLqE_WmePLA--lYTG0ZJVcHhpEld2qNTck_w0t_E9k/
Title: Why You Should Be BORING With Your Tech Resume (YouTube Video), link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MByD2CTwfmM&list=PL7NYbSE8uaBCq2fkG2zlFKvWJcvUL2MkJ&index=1
Title: THIS Is Why Your Resume Is Bad [Telling vs. Showing] (YouTube Video), link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sDbK84GEE94&list=PL7NYbSE8uaBCq2fkG2zlFKvWJcvUL2MkJ&index=2
Title: How To SUPERCHARGE Your Software Engineer Resume (YouTube Video), link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Wb-gHEO9ug&list=PL7NYbSE8uaBCq2fkG2zlFKvWJcvUL2MkJ&index=3
Title: My Resume As A UCLA Student Which Got Me My First Software Engineering Job (LinkedIn Post), link: https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6837074290295349248/
Title: My Resume After Facebook (LinkedIn Post), link: https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6818382738102591488/

stories.name: Interviewing
stories.description: When the user selects this input a second question with a second set of inputs is presented to the user
requirements: When the user selects the Interviewing input display this question: What part of the interview are you struggling with?
The second set of inputs below the question includ: Data structures and algorithms, Behvioral, System design, Nerves and anxiety, Studying in general
